redirects.comments:
This allows you to redirect from X (Twitter) to xcancel.com, which is powered by Nitter.

**Nitter** is a free and open-source alternative Twitter front-end focused on privacy and performance.

xcancel.com is one of the most popular Nitter instances, but it's just one of many instances. You can find other instances here:
https://status.d420.de
